page.title: 13A Day In My Holiday.
page.content: A typical day for me is to get up at 8.00 and at 8.30 have my breakfast. I have a bowl of special K cereal a piece of toast and a drink of orange. After breakfast I go outside and sit in the sun and read a book until Marie comes out. We have a little talk and then we both go inside and ask if we could play. Our mums say yes so we come back out I go over to Marie's house. We have another little talk and then we get the white tent out and we pretend that we are living in it. Then at dinner time I go home and I have my dinner. After dinner we go swimming in Burnham pool until about 4.00pm. Then we come back and have our tea. After tea I go outside and see Marie and then we play tennis over the fence until 8.30 when I go inside and watch television until I go to bed at 9.00. Such is my home life.
